text: Richard Krejčí (born 22 July 1970) is a Czech rower. He competed in the men's coxed four event at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Czech male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Czechoslovakia Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:People from Mělník
title: Richard Krejčí
